api_call:
curl --request GET \
  --url https://1forge.com/forex-quotes/quotes
functionality: Get quotes for all symbols
api_description: Stock and Forex Data and Realtime Quotes

functionality: Get quotes for all symbols
api_description: Stock and Forex Data and Realtime Quotes

api_call:
import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("1forge.com")

conn.request("GET", "/forex-quotes/quotes")

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))
functionality: Get quotes for all symbols
api_description: Stock and Forex Data and Realtime Quotes

api_call:
package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"net/http"
	"io/ioutil"
)

func main() {

	url := "https://1forge.com/forex-quotes/quotes"

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("GET", url, nil)

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)

	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := ioutil.ReadAll(res.Body)

	fmt.Println(res)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

}
functionality: Get quotes for all symbols
api_description: Stock and Forex Data and Realtime Quotes

api_call:
require 'uri'
require 'net/http'
require 'openssl'

url = URI("https://1forge.com/forex-quotes/quotes")

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port)
http.use_ssl = true
http.verify_mode = OpenSSL::SSL::VERIFY_NONE

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url)

response = http.request(request)
puts response.read_body
functionality: Get quotes for all symbols
api_description: Stock and Forex Data and Realtime Quotes

api_call:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://1forge.com/forex-quotes/quotes",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}
